about_the_game:
Truth Seekers is an immersive horror multiplayer cooperative shooter game that throws players into the heart of environments where urban legends and folklore monsters reside. Join forces with your friends to track down and confront the legendary Bigfoot, the elusive Stagwalker, and the ominous Roswell. Teamwork and strategy are key as you and your team navigate through dangerous encounters. Be careful as you decide whether to stick together or split up; the wrong choice could lead to the gruesome death of a hunter. To ensure smooth coordination, someone must take charge back at the RV, monitoring players' movements and surveillance cameras to call the shots and keep players informed of their surroundings. Do you have what it takes to hunt these urban legends?

ENSURE THE TEAM OPERATES SMOOTHLY

A team member can track players and view surveillance cameras placed by others back at the RV. Every ship needs a captain, will it be you?

COMMUNICATE BY ANY MEANS POSSIBLE

There are "dead zones" located throughout, which disable long-range communication with the walkie-talkie. Stay in touch by any means necessary.

CRAFT AND FIND GEAR UPGRADES TO AID IN YOUR HUNT

Find and craft weapons, medicinal supplies, alcohol, drugs, and other resources to aid in your hunt against these monsters.

WORK TOGETHER, OR IT COULD SPELL DEATH

Splitting up can be dangerous, but sometimes is necessary. Will you risk it?

OPERATE VEHICLES TO TRAVEL FASTER

Fit up to three members of the team into a vehicle, leaving one to fend for themselves. Traverse the landscape at faster speeds to aid in locating the monsters.

MIND ALTERING SUBSTANCES HELP REDUCE THE PAIN

Share a beer with your friends or indulge in the forest's natural mushrooms, which can be found throughout. They restore your health, but is it worth the price?

___________________________________

FEATURES:

• Proximity voice chat.
• 3 maps to hunt with varying difficulty and size, as well as monsters.
• Advanced, blood thirsty AI that wants you dead.
• Full multiplayer cooperative experience.
• Crafting and looting.
• And much, much more...
